name: SubitoSMS
author: SubitoSMS (by Linkas SRL)

sections.description:
SubitoSMS WordPress Plugin lets you send SMS texts to your WP web-site’s registered users, connecting to your SubitoSMS.it account.
It also modifies the basic WP user’s registration form, adding a field for the user’s mobile number.

New features

  1. Allow to send SMS to all users when new post is created
  2. Allow to select users to send SMS
sections.installation:
Installation is simple as a standard WordPress Plugin.

e.g.

  1. Download SubitoSMS-v1.x.zip file and upload to wordpress using Plugin menu
  2. Install from WordPress Plugin’s repository searching for SubitoSMS
sections.faq:
Are the SMS Free ?

Unfortunately not, but we have very cheap prices.

Do I need to sign-up ?

Yes, registration is free and you can test with some free SMS messages.
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • Support for WordPress 4.1.1
  • Allow to send SMS to selected users or to all users
  • Allow to automatically send customized SMS when new post is created
  • Localization added

1.3

  • Support for WordPress 3.8

1.2

  • First public release

short_description: Send SMS texts to all your WordPress web-site's registered users in one click!
description:
SubitoSMS WordPress Plugin lets you send SMS texts to your WP web-site’s registered users, connecting to your SubitoSMS.it account.
It also modifies the basic WP user’s registration form, adding a field for the user’s mobile number.

New features

  1. Allow to send SMS to all users when new post is created
  2. Allow to select users to send SMS

screenshots.caption: User registration - Registration form will be extended in order to allow users to add their mobile phone number
Send - Send menu will allow to send a message to all users that are registered and entered their mobile
Settings - Settings are very simple, username/password and the sender you want the user to see as from.
